name: Gaping Maw
description:
GAPING MAW

Endlessly tumble float through space as you employ self-defensive object-flinging at space horrors and an impending black hole of doom.

Credits for external assets used -

Contains a modified version of the godot logo, originally made by Andrea Calabró 
Contains music (c)2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

A GWJ 8 project by Plexsoup, Caevv, and DoggieBalloon

Using: Godot Game Engine, GIMP, Audacity

Source: https://github.com/godot-wildlings/gwj8
